products.name: Refresh Bedskin
products.description: Refresh Bedskin is a new-age multilayer disposable hospital bed fabric designed to improve patient hygiene and comfort. It is water-absorbent yet waterproof, breathable, and has a cotton-soft feel. The fabric is anti-microbial, disposable, and eliminates the need for laundry, helping reduce hospital-acquired infections.

key_features.title: Water Absorbent
key_features.description: Quickly absorbs fluids to keep patients dry and comfortable.

key_features.title: Waterproof Layer
key_features.description: Prevents leakage and protects hospital bedding.

key_features.title: Breathable Fabric
key_features.description: Ensures airflow for long-term patient comfort.

key_features.title: Disposable Use
key_features.description: Eliminates laundry, reducing infection risk.

key_features.title: Anti-Microbial
key_features.description: Helps reduce hospital-acquired infections.

products.name: Water-Powered LED Emergency Lamp Batteries
products.description: An eco-friendly lighting solution powered only by water (saltwater)â€”no electricity, batteries, or solar panels required. It can provide up to 120 hours of continuous light, making it ideal for rural areas, emergencies, outdoor use, and disaster relief.

key_features.title: Water Powered
key_features.description: No batteries or solar panels required.

key_features.title: Long Runtime
key_features.description: Provides up to 120 hours of light.

key_features.title: Emergency Ready
key_features.description: Ideal for disasters and power cuts.

key_features.title: Rural Focused
key_features.description: Designed for off-grid regions.

key_features.title: Eco-Friendly
key_features.description: Reduces energy dependence and supports sustainable living.

products.name: Ambient Disinfection Lighting (App Controlled)
products.description: Ambient Disinfection Lighting uses special visible light (non-UV) to kill bacteria, viruses, fungi, and mold in indoor spaces. It continuously sanitizes rooms such as hospitals, clinics, homes, and offices without harsh chemicals. The system is app-controlled and works over time to create safer, cleaner environments.

key_features.title: Visible Light Technology
key_features.description: Non-UV light kills bacteria, fungi, and viruses safely.

key_features.title: Chemical-Free
key_features.description: No harsh disinfectants or UV exposure.

key_features.title: Hospital Ready
key_features.description: Ideal for clinics, wards, ICUs, homes, and offices.

key_features.title: Continuous Protection
key_features.description: Works over time to inhibit microbial growth.

key_features.title: App Controlled
key_features.description: Smart control for modern healthcare environments.

products.name: I.V. Alert Alarm
products.description: The I.V. Alert Alarm is a life-saving hospital device that continuously monitors saline levels. It alerts medical staff when IV fluid drops below critical levels, preventing air entry and medical emergencies.

key_features.title: Real-Time Alerts
key_features.description: Instant notification when saline runs low.

key_features.title: Easy Attachment
key_features.description: Seamlessly fits on standard IV bottles.

key_features.title: Improved Staff Efficiency
key_features.description: Reduces manual checking workload.

key_features.title: Emergency Prevention
key_features.description: Prevents air entry and medical emergencies.

key_features.title: Patient Safety
key_features.description: Ensures continuous IV monitoring.

products.name: Motherâ€“Infant Anti-Theft Device
products.description: This device prevents infant theft and accidental baby mismatching in hospitals. It provides real-time security and peace of mind to mothers and families.

key_features.title: Infant Security
key_features.description: Prevents theft and mismatching of newborns.

key_features.title: Instant Alerts
key_features.description: Triggers alarms during unauthorized movement.

key_features.title: Hospital Integrated
key_features.description: Designed for maternity and neonatal wards.

key_features.title: Parent Peace of Mind
key_features.description: Reassures families about infant safety.

key_features.title: Real-Time Tracking
key_features.description: Ensures infants are securely tracked.

products.name: Muscle Hand Dynamometer (App Controlled)
products.description: The Muscle Hand Dynamometer is a smart grip-strength measurement and rehabilitation device used for injury recovery, arthritis, nerve issues, and post-surgery therapy. It is app-controlled and suitable for home and clinical use.

key_features.title: Strength Measurement
key_features.description: Accurately measures grip and muscle force.

key_features.title: Rehabilitation Support
key_features.description: Tracks recovery progress digitally.

key_features.title: App Controlled
key_features.description: Mobile-based insights and analytics.

key_features.title: Home Therapy
key_features.description: Ideal for virtual physiotherapy.

key_features.title: Post-Surgery Recovery
key_features.description: Supports injury and arthritis rehabilitation.

products.name: Self-Heating Food Heating Boxes
products.description: Self-Heating Food Boxes are designed to instantly heat food without electricity. They ensure hygienic, warm meals for travel, hospitals, outdoor use, and emergencies.

key_features.title: No Electricity Needed
key_features.description: Instant heating without power.

key_features.title: Hygienic Heating
key_features.description: Keeps food contamination-free.

key_features.title: Portable Use
key_features.description: Ideal for travel and outdoor use.

key_features.title: Emergency Ready
key_features.description: Perfect for disaster situations.

key_features.title: Safe & Warm Meals
key_features.description: Ensures meals are ready anytime.

products.name: Numbeaseâ„¢
products.description: Numbease is a compact, wireless medical device that reduces pain instantly during injections using neuromodulation. No creams, ice, or delays â€” just real comfort and improved patient compliance.

key_features.title: Instant Pain Reduction
key_features.description: Works within seconds without gels or ice.

key_features.title: Clinically Safe

products.name: Sun-a-Wear
products.description: Sun-a-Wear is a solar-powered wearable UV tracking system paired with a mobile application that delivers real-time UV exposure insights, adaptive alerts, and smart sunscreen reminders. Designed for families and outdoor users, it helps prevent overexposure to harmful ultraviolet radiation and promotes safer outdoor habits.

key_features.title: Real-Time UV Tracking
key_features.description: Continuously monitors UV radiation exposure using a solar-powered wearable sensor.

key_features.title: Personal Dose Alerts
key_features.description: Notifies users when their safe UV exposure limit is reached.

key_features.title: Smart Sunscreen Reminders
key_features.description: Provides timely alerts to reapply sunscreen based on UV intensity and exposure duration.

key_features.title: Actionable Recommendations
key_features.description: Offers personalized guidance to reduce UV risk and stay protected outdoors.

key_features.title: Solar-Powered & Lightweight
key_features.description: Operates without charging and is designed for comfortable everyday wear.

products.name: Smart Handy
products.description: Smart Handy is an app-enabled muscle hand dynamometer designed to support upper extremity therapy and rehabilitation. It helps patients and therapists measure grip strength, track progress digitally, and support recovery from injuries, neurological conditions, and post-surgical rehabilitation.

key_features.title: Grip Strength Measurement
key_features.description: Accurately measures hand grip and muscle strength.

key_features.title: App Enabled
key_features.description: Connects with a mobile app for progress tracking and insights.

key_features.title: Rehabilitation Support
key_features.description: Designed for physiotherapy, post-stroke, and injury recovery.

key_features.title: Home & Clinical Use
key_features.description: Suitable for hospitals, clinics, and home-based therapy.

key_features.title: Compact & Ergonomic
key_features.description: Comfortable design for repeated therapeutic use.

products.name: Energy Storage System
products.description: The Energy Storage System is a battery-based energy storage solution designed to store electricity generated from renewable sources such as solar and wind. It enables reliable power availability for homes, institutions, and remote locations, supporting energy independence and sustainability.

key_features.title: Renewable Energy Compatible
key_features.description: Stores power generated from solar and other renewable sources.

key_features.title: Reliable Backup Power
key_features.description: Ensures continuous electricity during power outages.

key_features.title: Scalable Capacity
key_features.description: Configurable for residential, commercial, and institutional use.

key_features.title: Energy Independence
key_features.description: Reduces dependence on grid electricity.

key_features.title: Sustainable Power Solution
key_features.description: Supports clean and efficient energy usage.
